name: OCR to Calculus Solution
description: Developed a mobile application to solve mathematical problems with Polynomial and Calculus equations.

name: YouTube Live Chat Analysis
description: Developed a real-time sentiment analysis system for YouTube live streams, providing valuable insights to content creators.

name: Online Video Lecture Summarization
description: Developed an automated online video lecture summarization system using JavaScript, Python, and the Lex Rank algorithm.

name: Save as PDF - Chrome Extension
description: A simple Chrome extension that allows you to download the current webpage as a PDF with a specific name.

name: Autofill Visa Security Questions
description: A Chrome extension to simplify Visa scheduling login process. This tool auto-fills your security question answers, making your login experience quick and hassle-free.

name: Portfolio
description: A portfolio website project showcasing the integration of Nginx, Docker, Oracle Cloud, and Next.js to master modern hosting and deployment techniques.
